chart.title: Unadjusted gender gap in average hourly wages
chart.subtitle: Gender wage gap, unadjusted for worker characteristics. Estimates correspond to the difference between average earnings of men and women, expressed as a percentage of average earnings of men.
chart.note: The data corresponds to gross hourly earnings and includes both full-time and part-time workers.

Gender wage gap (%).citationShort: – processed by Our World in Data
Gender wage gap (%).citationLong: – processed by Our World in Data. “Gender wage gap (%)” [dataset]. ILOSTAT Earnings and labour cost: Gender wage gap (%) [original data].
